body_html:
@meccaLeccaHi : Sorry that you're running into this. The error messages suggest trouble using CUDA/CUDNN, or in this last case, errors in loading the libcusolver.so library.

So the errors have changed after your reinstall? What is the location of libcusolver.so.8.0 on your filesystem?
body_text:
@meccaLeccaHi : Sorry that you're running into this. The error messages suggest trouble using CUDA/CUDNN, or in this last case, errors in loading the libcusolver.so library.
So the errors have changed after your reinstall? What is the location of libcusolver.so.8.0 on your filesystem?
body:
@meccaLeccaHi : Sorry that you're running into this. The error messages suggest trouble using CUDA/CUDNN, or in this last case, errors in loading the `libcusolver.so` library.

So the errors have changed after your reinstall? What is the location of `libcusolver.so.8.0` on your filesystem?
